# 0 = Mario 
# 1 = Brick
# 2 = Goomba
# 3 = Koopas
# 4 = Coin
# 5 = Cloud
# 6 = Platform:	cell_width	cell_height	length	thick	spritesID (6)

# 8 = Pipe
# 9 = Red Venus Fire Trap
# 10 = Green Venus Fire Trap
# 11 = Fire Bullet
# 12 = Piranha Plant
# 13 = Question Brick
# 50 = Portal: r	b	sceneID
